name: Cauliflower Rice with Sticky Orange Sauce
description: We're making things easy by using frozen riced cauliflower, which is not only convenient but also budget friendly (have you seen the cost of fresh?!).  Whether you're aiming to add more veggies to your table or simply looking for a delicious twist on rice, this dish has you covered. While your cauliflower gets cozy in the microwave, fire up the stovetop and whip up a zesty, sweet and sticky orange sauce to take this side dish over the top!
preparation: Place cauliflower rice in Multipurpose Steamer or Round Steamer. Cover; microwave on high, 8–9 min or until heated through.

Meanwhile, in Wok, combine seasoning, orange juice, soy sauce, and water. Bring to a simmer over medium heat for 1–2 min, stirring frequently, or until sauce has thickened.  If desired, stir in red pepper jelly.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 small bun with 2 tsp butter.

products.name: Sticky Orange Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: In less time than it takes to wait for takeout, you can have the best gluten free Sticky Orange Chicken ready to go! Just pair a few easy-to-shop-for ingredients with the blend, throw it in your wok (or frying pan) and you’ll have a kid-friendly, one-pot dinner on the table in less than 15 minutes.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
